mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAYMENT (PAY_NO, USER_NO, PRODUCT_NO, PAYMENT_METHOD, PAYMENT_AMOUNT , RESULT_STATUS, PAYMENT_DATE, EXPIRATION_DATE, DURATION) VALUES (#{payNo}, #{userNo}, #{productNo}, #{paymentMethod}, #{paymentAmount} , #{resultStatus}, #{paymentDate}, #{expirationDate}, #{duration})
mapper.select: SELECT PAY_NO, USER_NO, PRODUCT_NO, PAYMENT_METHOD, PAYMENT_AMOUNT , RESULT_STATUS, PAYMENT_DATE, EXPIRATION_DATE FROM payment WHERE user_no = #{userNo}
